README: This JSON document represents the main configuration options.
Please, be mindful, read each option's description before setting its value.
source_description: Connection parameters to your MySQL database
Please ensure, that you have defined all parameters properly.
Ensure, that details like 'charset' are included (if necessary).
Notice, any parameter, acceptable by the node mysql module can be placed here.
target_description: Connection parameters to your PostgreSQL database
Please ensure, that you have defined all parameters properly.
Ensure, that details like 'charset' are included (if necessary).
Notice, any parameter, acceptable by the node pg module can be placed here.
max_each_db_connection_pool_size_descrip: Maximal amount of simultaneous connections to your MySQL and PostgreSQL servers each.
Example: 20 means, that Nmig will create a pool of 20 connections to the source MySQL server
and 20 connections to the target PostgreSQL server.
number_of_simultaneously_running_loader_: Number of data-loader processes that will run simultaneously.
1. 'DEFAULT' - when set to 'DEFAULT', Nmig will run 2 data-loader processes.
Usually, migration gets accomplished faster with only 2 data-loader processes,
even if more CPU cores are available.
Yet, it is worth an effort to 'play' with this parameter prior running migration in production,
to check how many processes work best in your case.
When trying Nmig on your test-database, try both decreasing and increasing this number.
than a number of logical CPU cores of the machine running Nmig.
If greater number chosen - Nmig will run one loader process per each available CPU core.
loader_max_old_space_size_description: V8 memory limit of the loader process.
1. any positive integer, representing memory limit (in MB).
2. 'DEFAULT', representing V8 default memory limit for your current hardware.
streams_high_water_mark_description: Buffer level when stream.write() starts returning false.
This number is a number of JavaScript objects.
encoding_description: If not supplied, then utf8 will be used as a default.
schema_description: A name of the schema, that will contain all migrated tables.
If not supplied, then a new schema will be created automatically.
exclude_tables_description: List (Array) of tables, that will not be migrated.
By default, nmig will migrate all tables.
include_tables_description: List (Array) of tables, that will be migrated.
By default, nmig will migrate all tables.
uuid_columns_description: List the table.column of any MySQL columns that contain UUID values
And should be stored in Postgres UUID data types
migrate_only_data_description: In order to skip schema migration, and just migrate data into a preset tables
delimiter_description: Specifies the character, that separates columns within each record.
This must be a single one-byte character.
enable_extra_config_description: In order to enable the additional configuration options, placed at extra_config.json
